welcomePage.mainContent: Hello, I am software engeneer with interest in web development.
welcomePage.name: Aneta Potomská

footer.footerText: App was written using: Next.js, TypeScript a Bootstrap. Design was created in: Figma.
footer.name: Aneta Potomská

summerjob.label: SummerJob
summerjob.content: As part of my bachelor's thesis for the volunteer brigade I undertook the development of a website to manage the event.
summerjob.imgAlt: Post details from the SummerJob message board
summerjob.details: Work was done on the frontend (overall UI/UX improvement), backend and database schema. The project included requirements gathering and analysis (ER conceptual model), design (Figma), programming and testing (SuperTest, Chai, Mocha, usability testing).

asciiart.label: Ascii Art
asciiart.content: Convertor of any image to ASCII art form.
asciiart.imgAlt: Example of using Ascii Art converter
asciiart.details: The project is mainly focused on correct compliance of OOP principles and testing of all parts of the application.

java.label: Web application
java.content: It is a primitive system for the study department.
java.imgAlt: Adding a student in the application
java.details: The application mainly focuses on a properly written backend.
